content: Currently simp rewrites {1} to 1 and {0} to 0. Once this is done, it can't apply lemmas about singletons (e.g., mem_closure_singleton). @Floris van Doorn You've added this simp lemma in #3240. May I remove @[simp] attr?
Yeah, I've not always been happy by that simp lemma myself. Feel free to remove it.
I also vote for removal, I already had issues with this lemma.
I'll make a PR once I fix build failures.
